header.title: The best fence installation company in Menlo Park
bullets: Fast, responsive and friendly customer service from start to finish
FREE custom fence quotes that you can create and review online!
Transparent pricing so you know exactly what you’re getting.
Quality fence craftsmanship delivered by skilled contractors.

Yelp.description: Ergeon was an amazing company to work with. It started with Frank and the video consultation and walk thru. Then Chris, who was the foreman of the project and his fantastic team. The project manager, Daniela, was also great and was completely on top of the progress of the whole build. I would use them again in a heartbeat and I would recommend them highly.The fences are beautiful and the workmanship is really wonderful.
Yelp.name: Trudi B.
Yelp.title: Ergeon was an amazing company to work with.

Google.description: From beginning to end, this company was, by far, the best in their communication with me about my project. I would highly recommend them and look forward to using them again if the need arises.They went out of their way to make the entire process wonderful.
Google.name: Trudi B.
Google.title: They went out of their way to make the entire process wonderful.

faq.front-yard: 3 feet on triangle area, 4 feet for front yard
faq.corner-lot-rules: In a triangular area at the intersection of the streets which border a corner lot, the maximum height is 3 feet. This triangular area is determined by measuring 35 feet from the point of intersection of the two streets, along the right-of-way (or property) lines of both intersecting streets.

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor. Some people try to cut costs by using unlicensed contractors, but this can end up being a major issue if any problems happen during the installation or down the line. In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.

There’s a lot to consider when weighing the pros and cons of a wood fence versus a chain link fence. We’ve tried to make the process easier for you by diving deeper into some of the areas of consideration.
